results.title: Utility of support vector machine and decision tree to identify the prognosis of metformin poisoning in the United States: analysis of National Poisoning Data System
results.text_hl: In line with other studies, we also showed that @DISEASE_Acidosis @DISEASE_MESH:D000138 @@@acidosis@@@, @DISEASE_Hypoglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007003 @@@hypoglycemia@@@, @DISEASE_Water_Electrolyte_Imbalance @DISEASE_MESH:D014883 @@@electrolyte abnormality@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@, elevated anion gap, elevated @CHEMICAL_Creatinine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003404 @@@creatinine@@@, @DISEASE_Tachycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@, @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@renal failure@@@, age, and unintentional exposure to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ are the determinants of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ @DISEASE_Poisoning @DISEASE_MESH:D011041 @@@poisoning@@@ prognosis.

citations.NLM: Mehrpour O, Saeedi F, Hoyte C, Goss F, Shirazi FM. Utility of support vector machine and decision tree to identify the prognosis of metformin poisoning in the United States: analysis of National Poisoning Data System BMC Pharmacol Toxicol. 2022 Jul 13;23(1):49. PMID: 35831909
citations.BibTeX: @article{35831909, title={Utility of support vector machine and decision tree to identify the prognosis of metformin poisoning in the United States: analysis of National Poisoning Data System}, author={Mehrpour O and Saeedi F and Hoyte C and Goss F and Shirazi FM}, journal={BMC Pharmacol Toxicol}, volume={23}, number={1}, pages={49}}

results.title: Fatal metformin overdose presenting with refractory hypotension: Postmortem examination

results.title: Profound Metabolic Acidosis due to Metformin Intoxication Requiring Dialysis
results.text_hl: We present a unique case of a 61-year-old female with severe @DISEASE_Acidosis @DISEASE_MESH:D000138 @@@acidosis@@@ of pH = 6.72 and @CHEMICAL_Lactic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019344 @@@lactic acid@@@ of 26 mmol/L who presented obtunded after ingestion of an unknown amount of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. She was subsequently intubated, became @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotensive@@@, and was initiated on vasopressors.

citations.NLM: Hermez K, Dudash-Mion C. Profound Metabolic Acidosis due to Metformin Intoxication Requiring Dialysis Case Rep Nephrol. 2021;2021():9914982. PMID: 34123445

results.title: Effects of metformin on postprandial blood pressure, heart rate, gastric emptying, GLP-1 and the prevalence of postprandial hypotension in type 2 diabetes - a double-blind, placebo-controlled crossover study.
results.text_hl: Pre-prandial BP was unaffected by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. To conclude, in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ attenuates the @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotensive@@@ response to meals, associated with stimulation of @GENE_GCG @GENE_2641 @@@GLP-1@@@ and slowing of GE to reduce PPH.

citations.NLM: Quast DR, Xie C, Bound MJ, Grivell J, Hatzinikolas S, Jones KL, Horowitz M, Rayner CK, Nauck MA, Meier JJ, Phillips LK, Wu T. Effects of metformin on postprandial blood pressure, heart rate, gastric emptying, GLP-1 and the prevalence of postprandial hypotension in type 2 diabetes - a double-blind, placebo-controlled crossover study. results.title: The complexities of insulin allergy: a case and approach
results.text_hl: The second event entailed a similar reaction but this time there was also @DISEASE_Angioedema @DISEASE_MESH:D000799 @@@angioedema@@@ of the upper airway with difficulty breathing and @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@, immediately after injecting @CHEMICAL_Insulin_Detemir @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069057 @@@Levemir@@@  and @CHEMICAL_Insulin_Aspart @CHEMICAL_MESH:D061267 @@@NovoRapid@@@ , and taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.
